TopicTitle: Looking for alternative mirror to download games files...

Articles.Content:
Currently I am experiencing extremely slow download rates (~50kb/s).

Are there any mirrors out there?

A quick google search for "ksp-win-0-90-0.zip" turned up zilch.

No, there are not, you'll have to try at another time when your ISP is not throttling you, sorry.

There is no fix for this on our end.
